job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltstronggtWhat a Software Engineer means to usltstronggtltstronggt ltpgtltulgtltligtInternalize the companys goals and vision understanding critical and minimal needs foreseeing potential needs and coming up with solutions that fit the context ltligtltligtHelp us change the future of work for doctors in America by applying state of the art technology solutions including data API development modern integration patterns frameworks for building beautiful responsive applications machine learning natural language processing and explicable AI  in partnership with key partners ltligtltligtSupport all business lines including sales and business development by enabling those teams while balancing competing goals and making difficult tradeoffs when required ltligtltligtPartner effectively with Product User Experience Growth and Operations toward building bestinclass systems to give our physician partners insight into their patient panels ltligtltligtSupport the technology needs of various departments by creating a dataliterate ecosystem and helping the wider organization understand how the technology helps them and how to think about their initiatives in terms of our capabilities ltligtltulgtltstronggtltstronggtWho you areltstronggtltstronggtltulgtltligtWorking with team members with a diverse background is important to you and you value and thrive being exposed to different perspectives ltligtltligt18 years of experience in performing resultsdriven development in a collaborative environment ltligtltligtPreferably have a degree in computer science engineering applied math or a related field or have demonstrated significant growth and impact as an engineer regardless of your education ltligtltligtExperienced investing time before building to ensure you come up with a pragmatic design that has buyin and where you are able to best use your teammates strengths and feedback ltligtltligtA proven ability to conduct research and internalize user needs in partnership with Product and User Experience ltligtltligtAble to adjust the level of specificity and context for different audiences either in the interest of achieving common goals efficiently or to educate others ltligtltligtThoughtful collaborator with a deep appreciation for systems design and a passion for building amazing and powerful experiences while knowing the tradeoffs of moving quickly and getting things working vs going deep and perfecting a product for the longterm ltligtltligtHave experience in highly regulated environments and be mindful about privacy and security of our customers data ltligtltligtHealthcare or insurance or fintech experience is preferred but tell us why you are passionate about our mission ltligtltligtFor data engineers  experience in Python relational databases and data warehouses business intelligence tools containers cloud platforms command line scripting is desirable ltligtltligtFor web backend engineers  experience in Python relational databases cloud platforms is desirable ltligtltligtFor web frontend engineers  experience in React JavascriptTypescript CSS cloud platforms is desirable ltligtltligtA plus  not afraid to dive into devops as needed and help us iterate on an efficient builddeploy process and a solid infrastructure ltligtltligtExperience with startups is not necessary but you should be looking forward to bringing order power and role definition to an initial blank slateltligtltulgt
